trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle routed event that occur when a tooltip opens and closes.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理在工具提示打开和关闭时发生的路由的事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When a tooltip opens and closes, this delegate provides an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 当工具提示打开和关闭时，此委托将提供的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The element that specifies the tooltip inherits from either <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 指定工具提示的元素的继承<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, open and close events exist on both of these classes.
trans-unit.target: 因此，打开和关闭事件存在于两个类。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events that use this event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了使用此事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: |Events that occur when a tooltip opens|Events that occur when a tooltip closes| |--------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| These events are registered by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> class using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> fields, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> class does not expose these events on itself (attached or otherwise).
trans-unit.target: |工具提示打开时发生的事件 |工具提示关闭时发生的事件 | |--------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| 这些事件均由注册<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>类使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent>字段，但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>类不公开本身 （附加或其他方式） 上的以下事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes both implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> and expose this event by defining the events in the previous table, copying the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> fields to create new routed event identifiers that exist on the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>类都实现<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>和公开此事件与上表中定义的事件复制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>字段来创建新路由存在的事件标识符<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>类。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If the tooltip is defined as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> class are also raised when a tooltip opens and closes.
trans-unit.target: 如果工具提示指<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>对象，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>工具提示打开和关闭时，也会引发类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>
